Sep 20, 2003

Oligarch

Via Nathan Newman: > The United States is bringing in Yegor Gaidar to advise them on how to privatize Iraq’s industries. Why is this an appalling dsgrace? Because Gaidar was the man who presided in the Yeltsin years and handed the country over to the “oligarchs” who robbed the country blind.
